Trigger.name: Self-removed
Trigger.script:
if not target or not matches[2]:lower():find(target:lower(), 1, true) then return end
svo.rt_name = matches[2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s aura of weapons rebounding disappears\.$

Trigger.name: Razed
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You raze
^You raze (\w+)'s aura of rebounding with .+\.$

Trigger.name: Magi raze
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You call upon Whiirh to empower your staff and strike
^You call upon Whiirh to empower your staff and strike (\w+), the power of air dispersing (?:her|his) aura of rebounding\.$

Trigger.name: Serpent flay
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You flay away
^You flay away (\w+)'s aura of rebounding defence\.$

Trigger.name: Knight fracture
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You deliver a single, powerful blow against the aura of rebounding surrounding
^You deliver a single, powerful blow against the aura of rebounding surrounding (\w+), fracturing it\.$

Trigger.name: Knight two-handed cutting carve
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: Lunging forward, you bring
^Lunging forward, you bring .+? down in a savage diagonal blow, carving through (\w+)'s aura of rebounding\.$

Trigger.name: Knight two-handed blunt carve
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_name = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_razed = true tempTimer(2, [[svo.rt_razed = nil]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: Planting your feet, you whirl
^Planting your feet, you whirl .+? over your head before bringing it down with terrible force upon (\w+), shattering (?:his|her) aura of rebounding\.$

Trigger.name: Smoked
Trigger.script: tempTimer(6, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>aura%s coming up in two (2) seconds.", svo.rt_name, svo.getDefaultColor()) end) tempTimer(7, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>aura%s coming up in one (1) second.", svo.rt_name, svo.getDefaultColor()) end) svo.rt_razed = nil

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ takes a long drag off (?:his|her)? ?.*pipe\.$|^A great gurgling sound is heard as \w+ takes a long drag from an enamel bubble pipe\. A series of shining bubbles erupt from the bowl of (?:her|his) pipe\.$
return (svo.rt_razed and line:find(svo.rt_name, 1, true)) and true or false

Trigger.name: Got rebounding
Trigger.script: if multimatches[2][2] == svo.rt_name then selectCurrentLine() fg("gold") bg("firebrick") end

regexCodeList.string: You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around
^You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Flayed sileris
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_sname = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_flayed = true tempTimer(2, [[if svo.rt_flayed then svo.rt_flayed = nil end]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You flay the purple, waxy coating from
^You flay the purple, waxy coating from (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Flayed quicksilver
Trigger.script:
svo.rt_sname = multimatches[2][2] svo.rt_flayed = true tempTimer(2, [[if svo.rt_flayed then svo.rt_flayed = nil end]])
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0, 170, 255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: You flay the metallic coating from
^You flay the metallic coating from (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Got sileris
Trigger.script: if multimatches[2][2] == svo.rt_sname then selectCurrentLine() fg("blue") bg("firebrick") end

regexCodeList.string: A supple purple shell of sileris berry juice has formed around
^A supple purple shell of sileris berry juice has formed around (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Got quicksilver
Trigger.script: if multimatches[2][2] == svo.rt_sname then selectCurrentLine() fg("blue") bg("firebrick") end

regexCodeList.string: A supple metallic shell of quicksilver has formed around
^A supple metallic shell of quicksilver has formed around (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Applied sileris
Trigger.script: tempTimer(3.5, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>sileris%s coming up in two (2) seconds.", tostring(svo.rt_sname), svo.getDefaultColor()) end) tempTimer(4.5, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>sileris%s coming up in one (1) second.", tostring(svo.rt_sname), svo.getDefaultColor()) end) svo.rt_flayed = nil

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) applies a sileris berry to (?:him|her)self\.$
return (svo.rt_flayed and line:find(svo.rt_sname, 1, true)) and true or false

Trigger.name: Applied quicksilver
Trigger.script: tempTimer(3.5, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>quicksilver%s coming up in two (2) seconds.", tostring(svo.rt_sname), svo.getDefaultColor()) end) tempTimer(4.5, function () svo.echof("%s's <255,0,0>quicksilver%s coming up in one (1) second.", tostring(svo.rt_sname), svo.getDefaultColor()) end) svo.rt_flayed = nil

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) applies a quicksilver droplet to (?:him|her)self\.$
return (svo.rt_flayed and line:find(svo.rt_sname, 1, true)) and true or false
